name: M.N.S.T.R. - Print at Home
description: An easy to pick up and play TTRPG about moving goods along silk road style trade routes through a hazardous and magical world. But even easyer, as this a print at home edition of the same game. It is designed for a two sided printer, but can also work if the even pages are printed on the back of the odds. Simply fold in half, staple in the middle and play.
